ingredients.ingredient: 1 eggplant, peeled and sliced lengthwise into 1/4-inch slices
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
1 pinch Italian seasoning, or to taste
2 canned whole roasted red peppers, drained and diced

cookingTips: Salt eggplant slices and let sit for 20 minutes to draw out moisture before grilling
Pat eggplant dry before grilling to achieve better browning
Fill and roll warm eggplant slices while still pliable for easier rolling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the salting technique for eggplant and how to roll delicate grilled slices without tearing.
